nodes.text: Malklocs were reptilian creatures native to Dathomir, where they were near the top of the food chain despite them being herbivorous herd beasts. Because they were so big, only rancors could take them down.

Malklocs shared some resemblance to other massive saurians, such as the fambaa, huf dun, and tortons. Bioengineers were known to use the DNA of Malklocs to create mutated variants of the creature known as malosaurs.
